text:
="preserve">Sherbaz Khan Mazari () (6 October 1930 – 5 December 2020) was a Pakistani politician. Mazari was born in Rojhan, British Raj. He was an Independent and member of the National Awami Party. From 1970 until 1977, he was a member of the National Assembly. From 1975 to 1977, he was the Leader of the Opposition.
Mazari died on 5 December 2020 in Islamabad, Pakistan at the age of 90.
